attributes.action: We demand there be a fully independent public inquiry.
attributes.additional_details: No child should have to suffer this kind of abuse, ever.
attributes.background: We want a government-led, time-based full public inquiry into  historical, and current child sexploitation. This inquiry to be started no later than the second quater of 2025.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
